name: Tether Theatre
description:
Made in collaboration with:

Jana Panem @Crocodile_chop

Adam Quesnel

Jordan Baltich https://jordanbaltich.itch.io/

Tether Theatre is a team-based game with a twist. 

Each player is tied to their teammate with a rope, but if they touch their teammate they explode! Use strategies to make the other team explode more times to win the match.

Made for Sheridan College's fall Design week 2019.
